TopicTitle: 50% default throttle setting, Breaking my stuff...

Articles.Content:
Hi All,

I seem to be having a problem with this 50% throttle setting, not the usual "take-off" that most threads are talking about.

But for example when i dock to a space station my main engine is set to 0% and even most cases i will deactivate it.

The problem is when i switch from controlling the station to the spacecraft " [ or ] " it automatically resets the throttle to 50% and activates the engines.

And whilst I'm docked to the space station i have spent quite some time building, it looks like the old "Throw the brick in a washing machine" until it turns into a million pieces, or I've Alt+F4 the game.....

Anyone else had this or found a fix?

Cheers

Davion

If that's happening to you in the stock game, then it's definitely a bug, and it needs to be reported as such in the bug tracker or support forum.

If you have mods (especially multiple mods) installed then it's far more likely that one of the mods has a problem (or you have a synergistic failure) and you need to figure out which one it is, and report to the mod author.

I have never seen a ship, other than one on the launch pad, go to anything other than 0% when switching to it.
The DefaultThrottle mod allows you to change the default throttle setting to whatever you choose on load, I would think it would help with your vessel switching.

I don't suppose you have a joystick with throttle connected? it is possible that the current throttle setting on the stick is being applied. It happens to me frequently, although it is almost always that it is accidentally set to full throttle.
